Course pre-requisites can be found [here](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/simms_course/master/Prerequisites.html). All the raw files and code can be found [here](https://github.com/andrewcparnell/simms_course). Click 'Clone or Download' near the top right and then 'Download ZIP' if you want an offline copy of everything. 

## Monday

Introduction to SIA data

Time  | Class
------------- | ----------------------------------------------------
9:00-10:30 | [Introduction: why use a SIMM? (AJ)](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/simms_course/master/aj-content/intro-why-use-a-SIMM.html)
10:30-10:45 | Coffee
10:45-12:00 | Guided practical: Intro to SI data and biplots
12:00-13:00 | Lunch
13:00-14:00 | [An introduction to Bayesian statistics (AP)](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/simms_course/master/ap_notes/intro_bayes/intro_bayes.html)
14:00-15:00 | [Differences between regression models and SIMMs (AP)](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/simms_course/master/ap_notes/reg_and_simms/reg_and_simms.html)
15:00-15:15 | Break 
15:15-17:00 | [Practical: Revision on using R to load data, create plots and fit statistical models (AJ)](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/simms_course/master/aj-content/practicals/monday-practical.html)
